description: The Golden Norway Spruce (Picea abies 'Aurea') is an amazing addition to any landscape. This evergreen is an attention grabber with its unique golden color that stands out against green foliage. It adds a special charm to any garden with its uniform shape, situated in a distinguished pyramidal form. Its needles are soft to the touch and turn golden yellow in the winter, perfect for holiday decorations. The Golden Norway Spruce is easy to care for, extremely cold tolerant and a great choice for adding color and contrast. So, if youâ€™re looking for a showstopper for any outdoor space, then this is the perfect choice for you.
